vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συγ-κλάω,
break, break off, κλήματα [LXX+5th c.BC+]; of a bad carver, mangle, τὰ μέρη [Refs 4th c.BC+] K.:—passive, of persons engaged in servile occupations, to be cramped or stunted, τὰς ψυχὰς συγκεκλασμένοι τε καὶ ἀποτεθρυμμένοι διὰ τὰς βαναυσίας [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of lines, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to break in pieces together; fracture
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to break in pieces together; fracture
